results.name: a(n) = -1, 0 or +1 depending on whether A156552(n) is A000120-deficient, -perfect or -abundant: a(n) = sign(A324100(n)).
comment: a(n) = -1 if A156552(n) is in A175524, 0 if it is in A175522 and +1 if it is in A175526.
